packagesSection.title: DECK PACKAGES
packagesSection.subtitle:
Smartly bundled deck packages designed
to offer transparency and cost control

packages.requirements: Visual research is provided by the client.

mainFeatures.text: 1 Day of Visual Research and Mapping

packages.title: Knight
packages.description: A brave but decisive move where you must use your own cinematic expertise to help us build your vision.

packages.title: Blitz
packages.description: Fast, bold and impactful, Blitz grabs your attention by the collar and makes executives lean forward.

packages.title: Gambit
packages.description: An impressive, comprehensive deck with sophisticated design and strategic content architecture.

packages.title: Checkmate
packages.description: A stunning, investor-grade masterpiece with cutting-edge design, enhanced visuals, and maximum impact.

fullWidthCard.title: OUR BUNDLES
fullWidthCard.headline:
DECK
PACKAGES
fullWidthCard.body: Attractive bundle options that combine our services at a discounted rate. These bundles offer excellent value while providing clear structure, making it easier to understand exactly what you're getting for your money.

upgradeSection.title: UPGRADE YOUR PACKAGE

card.requirements: Text and source visuals must be provided

mainFeatures.text: Half a Day of Visual Research and Mapping

card.title: Pimp my Deck
card.description: Take your deck to the next level with premium features and enhanced design.

upgradeSection.footerText: Do you have specific or bespoke needs? At Boldmove we are super flexible. And we love a challenge! Give us a shout to talk it out.

items.title: BESPOKE AI VISUALS
items.body: Our signature approach to visual research complimented – on request – by sophisticated and tasteful AI for bespoke imagery tailored to your story

items.title: SIGNATURE FORMATS
items.body: From classic formats to fully immersive platforms, we design for every demographic – always with our unmistakable signature style

items.title: KEY ART
items.body: Bold, cinematic key art design for projects that have already been greenlit

items.title: WRITING DISCOUNT
items.body: 20% off content writing when added to a design package

items.title: FLEXIBLE PAYMENTS
items.body: Flexible, manageable payment options available upon request

items.title: CLIENT TRAINING
items.body: Complimentary client training on our design tools, helping you save time (and money) on revisions
